TopicTitle: [0.16 ish] The Truss Pack - Rugged parts for any eventuality! *2.0 NEARING RELEASE!*

Articles.Content: Hehe, I too am still your biggest fan Sherbetlemons!
Sherb, are you going to add docking clamps based on one of the coupling mods released recently?
The OTV and the Munar Lander work perfectly.
More parts is always a good thing!
